title: S13 Ep32: Witnessing the Impossible: The Scole Experiment
itunes:title: Witnessing the Impossible: The Scole Experiment
description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS is Witnessing the Impossible: The Scole Experiment with guest Robin Foy.

We discuss the 'Scole Experimental Group' from its foundation and the beginning of The Scole Experiment in 1993 to its very sudden and unexpected ending in November 1998. In all, 1,000 continuous hours of mediumship and objective Physical Phenomena. This represents true eyewitness account of this unique and pioneering experiment, which pushed the boundaries of psychic research further than ever before at that time, consequently changing the face of physical mediumship and its resulting phenomena for all time.

Get the books here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Visit their site here: http://robinsphysicalphenomena.webs.com/

www.TrueCar.com
